metadata.title: CVE-2020-14301 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: An information disclosure vulnerability was found in libvirt in versionsbefore 6.3.0. HTTP cookies used to access network-based disks were saved inthe XML dump of the guest domain. This flaw allows an attacker to accesspotentially sensitive information in the domain configuration via the`dumpxml` command.

criterions.comment: libvirt: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
